memberdef.name: ASSERT_ON_ERROR
PASSKEY
memberdef.initializer: "" /* Password in case of secure AP */

memberdef.name: PASSKEY_LEN
memberdef.initializer: pal_Strlen(PASSKEY) /* Password length in case of secure AP */

memberdef.name: SEC_TYPE
memberdef.initializer: SL_SEC_TYPE_OPEN /* Security type of the Access piont */

memberdef.name: SEC_TYPE_AP_MODE
memberdef.initializer: SL_SEC_TYPE_OPEN /* Can take SL_SEC_TYPE_WEP or * SL_SEC_TYPE_WPA as well */

memberdef.name: SSID_AP_MODE
memberdef.initializer: "<ap_mode_ssid>" /* SSID of the CC3100 in AP mode */

memberdef.name: SSID_NAME
memberdef.initializer: "<ap_name>" /* Access point name to connect to. */
